items.text: Did you know there are over 20,000 types of bees buzzing around the world? That’s like having a whole army of tiny superheroes!
While some bees live in big families called colonies, most prefer to go solo, just like a lone wolf but with wings!
The coolest bees, like honey bees, build their homes in hexagon-shaped hives. It’s like they’re little architects of the insect world!
